name: MOTORMOUTH
description:
MOTORMOUTH

In this game a friendly robot continually gets approached by different people with all kinds of questions and light conversation. These people expect the robot to respond in a sensible and natural manner. This is generally quite hard for robots, but you can help!

Goal

Control the robot's interaction with people. Each round represents a short dialogue in which you get a specific sequence of instructions that make the robot to react with the right response.

First watch the sequence of controls. Rember it well! Then repeat the sequence exactly as shown by clicking and dragging the controls. The difficulty of the sequences increases as the game progresses.

Controls

The game is completely controlled by the mouse

Buttons and switches: Click to activate
Slider and dial: Click and drag to activate

For how many conversations can you trick the humans into thinking that they are dealing with real robot AI?

Teljoor and Jordy Molenaar
